lead_paragraph: In a 100-minute interview, Mr. Trump said he might halt purchases of oil from Arab allies like Saudi Arabia unless they commit greater resources to fighting the Islamic State.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.print_headline: Foreign Policy, in Trump’s View, Is About Deals
headline.main: In Donald Trump’s Worldview, America Comes First, and Everybody Else Pays

snippet: In a 100-minute interview, Mr. Trump said he might halt purchases of oil from Arab allies like Saudi Arabia unless they commit greater resources to fighting the Islamic State.
abstract: Donald J Trump's view of foreign policy holds that America has become weakened as world power and series of economic deals are best way to re-establish its status; Trump has said he will likely seek to renegotiate several fundamental treaties with American allies; outlook, which Trump admits places America's interests first, is out of step with those held by other Republicans.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
